content.prompt: Which of the following best describes the trend in Eastern Europe from 1960 to 2000 ?

choices.label: Fertility rates dropped steadily from 1960 to 2000
Fertility rates dropped slightly between 1960 and 1990, then dropped sharply from 1990 to 2000
Fertility rates declined from 1960 to 1980, then increased from 1980 to 2000
Fertility rates showed little change over the period 1960 to 2000

topic.text: 9.14: 20th- and 21st-Century Culture, Arts, and Demographic Trends

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
